PC Number: 2004-0546

Date: 2004-05-04

                     Whereas the Honourable Paul G.M. Hermiston, a Judge of the Superior Court of Justice (Ontario), has become afflicted with a permanent infirmity disabling him from the due execution of his office and has tendered his resignation effective April 2, 2004;

 

                     Therefore, Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, hereby accepts the resignation of the Honourable Paul G.M. Hermiston and, pursuant to paragraph 42(1)(c) of the Judges Act, hereby grants him an annuity of $146,266.66 commencing on April 2, 2004, and continuing thenceforth during his life.


                     Attendu que l’honorable Paul G.M. Hermiston, juge de la Cour supérieure de justice (Ontario), atteint d’une infirmité permanente l’empêchant d’accomplir utilement les devoirs de sa charge, a donné sa démission à compter du 2 avril 2004,

 

                     À ces causes, sur recommandation du ministre de la Justice, Son Excellence la Gouverneure générale en conseil accepte la démission de l’honorable Paul G.M. Hermiston et, en vertu de l’alinéa 42(1)c) de la Loi sur les juges, accorde à ce dernier, à titre viager, une pension annuelle de 146 266,66 $ payable à compter  

du 2 avril 2004.
